name: Zombie Dash Kill
description:
Zombie Dash Kill

Welcome!

Are hardcore games for you? Introducing the 2D platformer "Zombie Dash Kill" from the Montece Gaming development team.

Content!

In this game you will find 31 challenging levels with a lot of content, tactical planning for passing, simple basic mechanics and complex decisions, fun situations. Eye-pleasing pixel graphics, a built-in store without microtransactions and unique locations are already eager to meet you!

Let's play!

We invite you to get acquainted with the game, thus you will receive a portion of pleasure, and we will give you your support. We will try our best to make the game even more interesting and challenging!
